Output log: I have it, but no idea how to upload it.

Additional info: the error log says that there was an exception in "mono.dll"

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T19:43:32Z" title="07/01/2015 07:43  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by xXIndestructibleEVAXx**

You can upload the log to any file sharing service such as Dropbox. This is likely to be an out of memory crash as the game can only use a max of about 3.4 gig before it will crash and there are a number of memory leaks and inefficient uses of memory that mean that this will happen eventually with how long depending on amount of mods and game settings. There are lots of threads that discuss ways of reducing the amount of memory used.
Ok, that's what I was expecting. I've already turned the textures down. Thanks!
